1681.80.text: The Eggheads have done what comes naturally to them.

1684.04.text: This winning streak of yours continues,

1686.44.text: albeit with a bit of a dent today.

1687.92.text: It means you won't be going home with the £14,000

1690.28.text: so the money rolls over to our next show,

1692.80.text: which may be even more exciting.

1694.40.text: Eggheads, congratulations. Who will beat you?

1697.00.text: Maybe down to one next time, hey?

1700.40.text: Join us next to see if a new team of Challengers

1702.72.text: have the brains to defeat them.
